document.full_text: the bulls are one of the most dangerous teams in the n.b.a., but the aesthetic wonder of derrick rose's play has obscured the sterling defensive play of the club as a whole.
document.title: rose's brilliance obscures bulls' other efforts
lines_and_colors: the bulls are one of the most dangerous teams in the n.b.a., but the aesthetic wonder of derrick rose's play has obscured the sterling defensive play of the club as a whole.
